title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: The user clicks on the Show Report Parameters button.
EB: Upon clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the default values should be displayed in the value box of each parameter, allowing the user to modify the parameter that they want to change.
SR:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click on the Show Report Parameters button.
3. Verify that the default values are displayed in the value box for each parameter.
4. Attempt to modify the desired parameter and confirm that it can be done without having to input values for all parameters again.
